comments.body:
```suggestion
  number: 0
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - rdkit
    - ambertools
    - {{ pin_subpackage('openff-fragmenter-base', exact=True) }}

test:
  imports:
    - openff.fragmenter
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
